runs.comm: bowls this one with a pause, the batsman comes forward and defends
slower and tossed up on off, the batsman comes forward and defends again
shorter this time, Tamim had plenty of time to rock back and punch it through the gap at backward point
he comes down the pitch very early, but the bowler fires this quick. Tamim dabs it to cover and calls for a single
he pushes this one through on off stump, the batsman works it away to deep midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman stays patient and defends it to midiwkcet
this is beautifully played! The ball was angling across the right hander, who just shows it the way past the first slip fielder.. Fraught with risk... but well played
he shimmies down the pitch, but has to defend the back of length delivery to off side
he waits on the back foot and defends the back of length delivery to point
slower delivery on the pads, it's nudged to short fine leg for a single
he gets a massive top edge as he goes for a pull, but this one lands safely behind short fine leg fielder..
good over from Tanvir! this one is right in the  channel outside off, the batsman can only defend it to point
tossed up and slower, the batsman looks to play it to leg side, but gets a leading edge to the off side
he comes down the pitch and takes the flighted delivery on the full, whips it to deep midwicket
he is beaten by the quicker one again! Tamim was out of the crease early but Hafeez fired it quick and short.. The batsman only could it pad it to the off side
gives himself a little room and slams the length delivery over midwicket.. that hits the rope on the full. Nothing wrong with the delivery, just a very good connection from Anamul
comes a step down the pitch and defends the back of length delivery back down the pitch
fuller on the stump, it's driven to long on for a single
good delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to cover and calls for what looks like a bad call for a single.. He is struggling to make it and survives as the fielder misses the stumps
how do you pick a slower ball from that action! Tamim has no clue as he leaves this slower bouncer outside off
he comes down the pitch and tries to slash it through cover, but gets cramped for room. He still manages to squeeze it in the gap at point
stylish! This one is short and too leg-sidish.. Tamim stands on one leg and whips this off his hips to fine leg boundary
another back of length delivery on the pads, Tamim clips it behind square on the leg side for another couple
he comes forward and dabs it to point for another tricky single.. Direct hit and Anamul would have been history
he comes down the pitch and punches the slower delivery straight to mid on

game over! Umar Gul runs all the way to Tamim to let him know he got him proper.. Tamim was down the pitch again, making room along the way, but the bowler fired a quick delivery on to his body, which the batsman chopped on to the stumps..
length delivery on off, 138 kph, the batsman comes solidly behind it and defends it to off
it's a low full toss on off stump but Shakib misses out as he slices this straight to cover point
back of length delivery on the stumps, he gets off the mark with a nudge to midwicket
fuller delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it to wide mid-on to keep the strike
he greets the champion bowler with a wonderful shot over midwicket... Comes down the pitch and plays it with turn..
lots of air on this one, the batsman looks to work it to the leg side but gets hit on the pads
some spin for Ajmal now, the batsman defends it to midwicket
Anamul has been worked out by Ajmal! Lots of air on this one and Anamul is early on his drive, lobs a simple chance for the bowler..
flatter and this one goes straight through.. the batsman waits and defends it to off

wonderful delivery! tossed up, this is the doosra, spins away as the batsman looks to drive this.. Kamran removes the bails in a flash and the umpires want to check.. This is tricky for Bangladesh.. the batsman's feet go up in the air briefly.. but he is fine
flatter delivery, dabbed to long on off the back foot
slower and outside off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
fuller and with more air this time, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
fuller and on off, the batsman pushes it to long on
flatter, but shorter too, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep cover
fuller delivery on the stumps, worked away to deep midwicket
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
floated on the stumps again, no room whatsoever, the batsman defends
takes a step down the pitch, but it not to the pitch of the delivery, defends
looks to paddle this leg-sidish delivery fine, misses it .
goes for a big sweep but gets a big top edge that, luckily for him, lands safely at deep backward square leg
tossed up delivery on off, he dabs it on the leg side for a single
comes out as soon as he sees flight on this one, squeezes it out to wide long on
he gets wicket first ball! It's a typical Lala delivery, quick at 99 kph, skids along and the batsman, looking for a cut, can only edge it to the keeper
he gets off the mark with a fine paddle off a fuller delivery.. neat shot as this was heading down leg side
he waits on the back foot and punches it to deep cover for a single
floated outside off, the batsman chops it straight to backward point
he goes deep in the crease and works this away to deep midwicket for a single
waits on the back foot and cuts this flatter delivery to point
the finger of death sends the Bangladesh captain back! He didn't have much of a chance as he played outside the line of this arm-ball, that was hitting middle
he comes down the pitch straight away but doesn't get hold of his lofted shot! There are shouts of catch it, but this clears the midwicket fielder
flatter delivery on the pads, nicely clipped in the gap at square leg for a quick couple
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it long off for a single
he takes a step down the pitch and punches this flighted delivery to long on
comes out of the crease early and is beaten by the direction of the ball - it's going down leg.. The batsman then pads it away
quicker delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman defends it to midwicket
well-bowled lala, says Kamran as the bowler flights this one, the batsman defends
slower still, Shakib dabs it to the off side for a single
fuller and quicker outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to cover point
fuller and flighted outside off, the batsman gets under it and chips it over extra cover for a couple
quicker delivery on the stumps, there is no room on that too.. The batsman defends it to off
slower and on the stumps, the batsman pushes it softly to midwicket for a single.. Akmal fails to take the throw .. but Ajmal does well backing that up..

this could be all over for Shakib now! He has been restrained in this innings so far but looks to thrash this outside the ground.. Comes way down the pitch.. but misses completely.. The keeper takes the bails off.. But hey, Shakib has swung his bat and turned all the way in time.. he could be in here. He is nowhere near the crease, but his bat has come in.. Wow.. that's a good reprieve
now he connects! This is huge.. He comes down the pitch and whacks it over midwicket.. huge huge hit..

he is not going to play the waiting game anymore.. Brings the crowd back to life with another powerful mow to the leg side.. It went high and kept the fielder interested for a bit, but landed just over the boundary
bowls a good full delivery, it's a yorker.. the batsman defends it to the off side
flatter and on the pads, the batsman picks a single to backward square leg to keep the strike
quicker and flatter outside off, the batsman nudges it to midwicket off the back foot for a single
flatter and quicker, turns in sharply, the batsman whips it to square leg for a single
bowls it like a right-handed Shakib.. very round-arm.. the batsman takes a single to short fine leg
fires this one on the pads, the batsman plays outside the line, gets hit on the pads, but they take a leg bye
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman squeezes it out to point
flatter and outside off, the batsman nudges it to square leg off the back foot
quicker delivery from Afridi! The batsman looks to cut it, but it takes a thick outside edge.. No way kamran could have got it even though he got a glove to it..
he chips this one to long off for a single
slower this time from Lala, the batsman is made to wait and he defends it to off
fuller outside off, Nasir drives it to deep cover
quicker on the pads, the batsman pushes it with soft hands to midwicket for a couple
goes deep in the crease and crunches this to deep cover
neatly flicked off the pads! This was a length delivery, but Shakib knew there was a gap at deep backward square leg, picks it up comfortably
comes down the pitch and hammers this length delivery over mid-off.. This is a good hit.. They need, as Zeeshan says, truck loads of those to construct their Burjs
Malik drops an easy one at long on now, in keeping with the tradition this tournament.. Shakib didn't get any timing as he looked to launch this fuller delivery
he follows it up with a good yorker outside off, Shakib is beaten
another full delivery on the pads, the batsman chips it to wide long on for a couple of runs

Umar Akmal doesn't give Shakib the chance! The batsman didn't have an option really -- he looks to whack this short delivery through off side.. but it gets too big on him and he just manages to get a thick top edge that Akmal pouches easily at point
tossed up on the pads, the batsman dabs it to short fine leg for a single
fuller delivery outside off, driven easily to deep extra cover for a single
he waits on the back foot and chops it to point
this is crisply hit! He comes down the pitch and creams this full delivery over extra cover... That shows you the talent of this man..
waits on the backfoot and chops this to short third man
comes down the pitch again, but gets a thick inside edge to backward square leg that brings up the team's 100
this is a very neat late cut! He waits till very late and cuts it almost off the keeper's hands.. runs it down fine on the off side
on the pads, the batsman nudges it to backward square leg for a single
flatter delivery outside off, Mahmudullah gets space to free his arms and clobbers it over midwicket.. That doesn't really go high.. Flat hit
pushed through on off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
very slow this tome, the batsman dabs it to midwicket for a single
and that is all there is to it! Fuller, quicker, and straighter.. The bowler fires it in as he sees Nasir come down the pitch.. That beats the bat and Kamran does the rest..
fires in a slowish yorker, but this goes down the leg side
length delivery outside off, the batsman is a touch late on the shot, pushes it to point
fuller delivery on the stumps, Ziaur flicks it in the gap at deep backward square leg, but the fielder manages to keep it in
quick short ball outside off, Mahmudullah is hurried in his pull shot, ends up pushing it as far as midwicket only
another short ball! This one fizzes past the top edge. Kamran appeal for a catch and the umpires raises the finger. the silence in the crowd gives you no hint of a wicket falling ... No. 3 for Gul
another short delivery.. this one is quite quick.. the batsman sways away from the line
length delivery, hammered over midwicket with a powerful swing
he comes from round the wicket, the batsman clips the length delivery to deep midwicket
too quick for the batsman as he looks to pull the back of length delivery to the leg side, ends up playing it to mid off
moves his front leg out of the way and swats the length delivery over mid-off for a boundary
gets a low full toss and slashes it to deep extra cover for a single
bowls it short of length on the stumps, the batsman clips it to deep square leg for a couple
he fires this one on the blockhole, the batsman can only dig it out to long off for a single
he gets an inside edge to backward square leg as looks to heave this full delivery
oh this is beautifully played by  Mortaza! It's very good yorker, but the batsman manages to get his bat down in time to run it down fine on the off side
this time it's the slower ball, but Mashrafe targets the third man area again.. Allows the ball to come to him, then ramps it fine on the off side
first moves to the leg side, then over to the off side as he tries to ramp it over his shoulder.. it's a good sharp bouncer and he fails to make contact
looks to paddle this one fine on the leg side, but gets hit on the pads.. Gul gives him a good proper stare as he walks back to his run-up
fuller delivery, cracked down to long off for a single..
